message: Bob, I'm offering you the product for $2000000.  I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but based on my research and budget, I am unable to meet the price of $2000000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1800000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I understand your budget,  $1800000 is unfortunately below my minimum. I'm willing to come down to $1900000 to make this deal work.  Let's find common ground.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my current financial situation and considering the market value of similar products, I am proposing a counteroffer of $1750000. I hope this proposal is acceptable.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1750000 is still significantly below my minimum. To be fair to both of us, I can offer to lower my price to $1850000. This is a final concession on my end.  Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your efforts in trying to reach an agreement, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer $1800000 for the product. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range.
